tournaments.name: Spring Guitar Championship 2026
tournaments.description: Join our prestigious spring competition featuring solo performances and original compositions. Show the world your musical talent!
rules: Any guitar style is welcome (classical, acoustic, electric)

tournaments.name: Summer Acoustic Festival 2026
tournaments.description: Celebrate the summer with acoustic guitar performances. Perfect for folk, fingerstyle, and classical guitarists.

tournaments.name: Winter Guitar Championship 2025
tournaments.description: Our annual winter championship brought together the best guitarists from around the world.

tournaments.name: Fall Electric Guitar Showdown 2025
tournaments.description: Electric guitar competitors battled it out with stunning solos and innovative techniques.

winners.name: Sarah Chen
winners.description: Sarah's breathtaking classical guitar interpretation of contemporary pieces captivated the judges with technical precision and emotional depth.
winners.bio: Classical guitarist and composer from San Francisco

winners.name: Marcus Rodriguez
winners.description: Marcus brought innovative flamenco fusion techniques that pushed the boundaries of traditional guitar performance.
winners.bio: Flamenco guitarist and instructor from Barcelona

winners.name: Elena Petrova
winners.description: Elena's original composition showcased masterful fingerstyle technique with hauntingly beautiful melodies.
winners.bio: Fingerstyle guitarist and songwriter from Moscow

winners.name: David Nakamura
winners.description: David's lightning-fast shred technique combined with melodic sensibility created an unforgettable performance.
winners.bio: Rock guitarist and session musician from Tokyo

winners.name: Lisa Anderson
winners.description: Lisa's jazz fusion improvisation demonstrated exceptional musicality and genre-bending creativity.
winners.bio: Jazz guitarist and educator from New York

winners.name: Carlos Santos
winners.description: Carlos delivered a powerful rock performance with innovative effects and dynamic stage presence.
